meaningMnemonic: It will <kanji>pass through</kanji> what you <kanji>believe</kanji> and run into some <kanji>netting</kanji>. Just think about how all these communications are passing through between people, and everyone believes everything that's being said. Netting this all up (all these communications!) leaves you with a <vocabulary>communication network</vocabulary>. What fun!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
